name: GOBLIN KING (BlueBean) (BlueBean)
description:
Description Goblin King is a fast paced Gambling Rogue-like Card Game!  Use Gambling cards to play addicting mini games in order to defeat monsters. Use powerful spells to help heal, shield, and defend. Avoid alternate enemy types like poison, boom, bleed, vampire, and more! Defeat powerful bosses to level up and earn new powerful cards! Make your deck and become the GOBLIN KING!! Mechanics The Gambling Card

Cards that trade coins for mini games

The Map Your choice of how to continue through your journey The Perk Upgrades picked up in your journey that are lost after death. Play Now for only $5!!

Credits:

Niall Durcan - music

Sean Kean - developer

ImmunityS - Art
